articles.title: Mirr Tech Start-Up Podcast Featuring Jack O'Regan Kenny
articles.description: As mentioned, https://twitter.com/jackoregankenny is the co-founder of the Irish tech startup https://mirr.tech/, which has patented and developed a new touchscreen smart mirror. It looks like a reflective mirror, but has the full functionality of a tablet. Jack founded the company along with https://twitter.com/aliceshaugh in 2019.
